text: "Never, ever, let anyone tell you what you can and can't do. Prove the cynics wrong. Pity them for they have no imagination. The sky's the limit. Your sky. Your limit. Now. Let's dance."

text:

author: Javeria Asghar Ali 🇵🇰 🇵🇸
text:
#شہادتِ_امیرالمومنین_امام_علیؑ 
Last Will of Imam Ali a.s 
Do not be sorry for anything of this world that you have been denied. Speak the truth and act in expectation for reward. Be an enemy of the oppressor and helper of the oppressed.

author: Javeria Asghar Ali 🇵🇰 🇵🇸
text:
Hazrat Ali(RA)was the fourth caliph of Muslims.He spent his childhood with our Prophet .He was the first child who accepted Islam while he was just 10 years old. Holy Prophet (SAW) gave him the title of Asadullah which means Lion of Allah.

author: Javeria Asghar Ali 🇵🇰 🇵🇸
text:
Nothing lasts forever ...
Not even your troubles -

author: Javeria Asghar Ali 🇵🇰 🇵🇸
text:
The highest form of الاخلاص (sincerity) is doing things solely for the sake of Allah. 
Not for reward, not for forgiveness, just for Allah.
Look at the connection Allah wants you to have with him, look at the Love in such a connection ❤️

author: Javeria Asghar Ali 🇵🇰 🇵🇸
text:

author: Javeria Asghar Ali 🇵🇰 🇵🇸
text:
Allah forgives many of His servants on this night.
The Prophet (saw) said, Allah, gazes at His creation on the 15th night of Sha’ban & then forgives all His slaves except for 2 types of people: those who attribute partners to Allah & those who have rancor for their fellow Muslims

text:
